name: Splitter.Root
description: A component that divides your interface into resizable sections
description_zh: A component that divides your interface into resizable sections

asChild.description: Use the provided child element as the default rendered element, combining their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 使用提供的子元素作为默认渲染元素，结合它们的 props 和行为。

defaultSize.description:
The initial size of the panels when it is first rendered.
Use this when you do not need to control the state of the carousel.
defaultSize.description_zh:
首次渲染面板时面板的初始大小。
当您不需要控制轮播的状态时，请使用此选项。

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.description: The ids of the elements in the splitter. Useful for composition.
ids.description_zh: splitter 中元素的 id。对合成很有用。

orientation.description: The orientation of the splitter. Can be `horizontal` or `vertical`
orientation.description_zh: 分流器的方向。可以是 'horizontal' 或 'vertical'

size.description: The size data of the panels

events.name: sizeChange
events.description: Function called when the splitter is resized.
events.description_zh: 调整拆分器大小时调用的函数。

events.name: sizeChangeEnd
events.description: Function called when the splitter resize ends.
events.description_zh: splitter 调整大小结束时调用的函数。
